data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaila, Lauri (2009): Notes on the genus Perittia of the West Palaearctic region with descriptions of three new species (Lepidoptera: Elachistidae). Zootaxa 2230: 16-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190273
